column4: Hi guys, I installed Maverick on my Netbook. It's awsome! great job
Is anyone familiar with the make command in bash?
Under normal circumstances all you need to do is type make and then maybe sudo make install
if you are looking at your public address, go to whatismyip.com
That's the problem. All the other computers can connect to it's IP but I can't
All computers are set for DHCP and I've tried with my wireless that has DMZ and I'm currently on ethernet
so if you ping your router, do you get a reply?
It fails instantly on all browsers. I get a "cannot connect" message from the browser before I even let go of the enter key
Yes I always get a very fast ping reply
This computer has been able to to it before for years.... and other computers can still do it
All websites I ping reply quickly. I can also access them
maybe you could try to update your firmware but I doubt this will change anything
How do I update the firmware if I can't get at the web interface?
Yeah. Browsers won't load it so I can't get at it. Other computers do, however
well, why don't u just use another computer to do your administrative work ?
